formal.name: Magical Looks Navy Blue Sparkly Pleated
formal.description: Sparkly pleated fabric shapes this stretchy dress that has adjustable spaghetti straps (that crisscross in the back), a deep V-neckline, and triangle cups. A banded waist tops a full maxi skirt for a luxe finish. Hidden back zipper/clasp

formal.name: Sweep of Romance Shiny Black Floral Sequin Strapless
formal.description: Shiny sequins decorate a mesh overlay that boasts a large-scale floral print, shaping a strapless bodice with hidden no-slip strips. Fitted waist features a removable satin ribbon belt, atop a glamorous A-line skirt that finishes at a ballroom-ready maxi hem. Hidden back zipper/clasp

YourStyle.name: Everlasting Enchantment Royal Blue Embroidered Tulle
YourStyle.description: The elegant embroidery continues through the waist and cascades onto the tulle maxi skirt, with hidden supports at the hem that provide structure to the ball gown-style silhouette. A flirty thigh-high side slit and a dramatic train at the back add eye-catching finishing touches to this statement-making dress! Hidden back zipper/clasp.

formal.name: Hollywood Heroine Black Satin Bow Strapless
formal.description: This sleek woven satin gown begins with a strapless neckline (with hidden no-slip strips) and a dramatic bow decoration that tops a ruffled detail. Column silhouette tumbles down to a maxi hem, complete with a sultry thigh-high slit. Hidden back zipper/clasp.

formal.name: All Romance Black Floral Jacquard Strapless
formal.description: Woven jacquard fabric, with an embossed purple and gold floral design, shapes this stunning dress that has a strapless sweetheart neckline (with no-slip strips) and a princess-seamed bodice (with supportive boning). A high waist tops a billowing high-low skirt with banding at the hem for added structure.

formal.name: Constantine Rust Orange Satin
formal.description: Lulus Exclusive! Dazzle everyone when you walk in wearing the Lulus Constantine Rust Orange Satin Maxi Dress! Sleek and shiny satin shapes this stunning dress, with a pleated, surplice bodice, supported by adjustable spaghetti straps. Fitted waist tops a full maxi skirt with a daring side slit.

formal.name: Constantine Lavender Satin
formal.description: Dazzle everyone when you walk in wearing the Lulus Constantine Lavender Satin Maxi Dress! Sleek and shiny satin shapes this stunning dress, with a pleated, surplice bodice, supported by adjustable spaghetti straps. Fitted waist tops a full maxi skirt with a daring side slit. Hidden back zipper/clasp.

formal.name: Moriah Mustard Yellow Satin Wrap
formal.description: Soft woven satin shapes this beautiful gown with adjustable skinny straps, ruffled cold shoulder sleeves, and a surplice bodice (with modesty clasp). Adjustable waist sash creates a custom fit atop a wrap maxi skirt that flows gracefully with each step.

formal.name: Picture Perfect Emerald Green Lace
formal.description: A stunning, floral, crochet lace overlay shapes a modified halter neckline and darted bodice. Dreamy chiffon takes over at the banded waist to fall into a showstopping maxi skirt with a sexy side slit. Hidden back zipper/clasp.

formal.name: Dazzled Up Champagne Embroidered Backless
formal.description: Intricate floral embroidery dances across sheer mesh as it shapes an apron neckline and adjustable spaghetti straps, that crisscross atop an open back. A princess-seamed bodice and fitted waist top a stunning maxi skirt with a mermaid silhouette and sexy thigh-high side slit.

formal.name: Regular Fit Double-breasted jacket
formal.description: Double-breasted jacket in a lyocell weave. Regular fit with peak lapels, a chest pocket, jetted front pockets with a flap, and two inner pockets. Buttons at the cuffs and two back vents. Lined. Fabric made from lyocell is super soft, wrinkle resistant and drapes beautifully.

formal.name: Slim fit jersey jacket
formal.description: Single-breasted jacket in stretch jersey with a collar, narrow notch lapels and decorative buttonhole. Slim fit with a chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. One button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Partly lined.

formal.name: Regular Fit Suit
formal.description: Suit in woven fabric with a zip fly and waistband with a button and hook-and-eye fastener. Regular fit with diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases.

formal.name: Regular suit
formal.description: Suit trousers in woven fabric with a zip fly and waistband with a button and hook-and-eye fastener. Regular fit with diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases.

formal.name: Suit Straight Fit
formal.description: Extended waistband with a concealed button and hook-and-eye fastener, and a zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and straight legs with pleats and creases

formal.name: Suit waistcoat slim fit
formal.description: Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with buttons at the front, a chest pocket and jetted front pockets. Back in a glossy weave with an adjustable tab. Lined.

formal.name: Slim Fit easy-iron shirt
formal.description: Slim-fit shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Gently rounded hem.

formal.name: Slim Fit Suit
formal.description: Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Slim fit with side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases.

formal.name: Slim Fit Suit
formal.description: Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Slim fit with side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases.

formal.name: Relaxed Fit Lyocell Suit
formal.description: Relaxed-fit suit trousers in a lyocell weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Fabric made from lyocell is super soft, wrinkle resistant and drapes beautifully.

Semiformal.name: Lulus Cutout and About Black Skater Dress
Semiformal.description: Medium-weight stretch knit shapes a rounded neckline atop a sleeveless bodice with princess seams for a tailored fit. A sultry racerback is framed by cutouts for a unique open back, all above the fitted waist and flirty skater skirt below. Hidden zipper at back.

Semiformal.name: Always Admired Black Sleeveless Mini Dress
Semiformal.description: Medium-weight stretch knit shapes this cute little dress that features tank straps, a square neckline, and princess-seamed bodice. Fitted waist tops a flirty mini skirt with an A-line silhouette and side slit. Hidden back zipper.

Semiformal.name: In Love Forever Plum Lace-Up High-Low Maxi Dress
Semiformal.description: You'll always be in love! Gauzy woven fabric dances across a surplice neckline with elegant princess seams. A set of crisscrossing adjustable straps top off the alluring lace-up back. A wrapped maxi skirt stuns with a double tier of flouncy ruffles before falling to a high-low hem. Hidden back zipper/clasp.

Semiformal.name: Here's to Us Burgundy High-Low Wrap Dress
Semiformal.description: Breezy woven fabric sweeps over a sleeveless wrap bodice with adjustable spaghetti straps, modified racerback, and tying waist sash. High-low maxi skirt has a front slit and rounded hem.

Semiformal.name: Shape the Night Dark Teal Blue Asymmetrical Midi Dress!
Semiformal.description: Look chic with this dress that is composed of stretchy knit fabric that shapes an asymmetrical neckline, a darted bodice, and adjustable spaghetti straps. A high, fitted waist continues to a figure-skimming silhouette before ending at an asymmetrical midi hem with a flirty side slit.

Semiformal.name: Always Celebrating Ivory Satin Off-the-Shoulder Mini Dress
Semiformal.description: Sleek woven satin sweeps across a sexy off-the-shoulder neckline (with hidden no-slip strips), a surplice bodice, and short sleeves. Gathered high waist sits above a mini skirt with an asymmetrical overlapping panel. Hidden back zipper/clasp.

Semiformal.name: Your Sweetie Red Tie-Strap Mini Dress
Semiformal.description: Stretch-woven fabric shapes this darling dress that falls from tying straps into a square neckline and princess-seamed bodice. A high, fitted waist tops an A-line skirt with a notched mini hem. Hidden back zipper.

Semiformal.name: Feeling Coy Black Scalloped V-Neck Bodycon Dress
Semiformal.description: Stretchy, medium-weight knit shapes this flirty dress with a V-neckline, princess seamed bodice, and figure-flaunting bodycon silhouette. Scalloped detailing along the neckline and side slit add a little something extra! Hidden back zipper/clasp.

Semiformal.name: Cocktail Club White One-Shoulder Midi Dress is certainly a top shelf choice
Semiformal.description: Stretchy crepe knit shapes a one-shoulder neckline that flows into two asymmetrical tank straps above the fitted bodice. High waist tops a column-style midi skirt with a flirty side slit. Hidden side zipper/clasp.

Semiformal.name: Reinette Hot Pink Midi Dress garner attention wherever you go!
Semiformal.description: Sleek, woven fabric falls from adjustable skinny straps, into a princess-seamed bodice, fitted waist, and flowing midi skirt with a lightly pleated, overlapping panel that creates a faux wrap silhouette. Slight high-low hem adds an elegant finish. Hidden back zipper/clasp.

Semiformal.name: Attitude White Off-the-Shoulder Bodycon Midi Dress!
Semiformal.description: Stretchy techno crepe knit shapes this sophisticated dress that features an off-the-shoulder neckline (with hidden no-slip strips), short sleeves, and a princess-seamed bodice with an overlay detail. High, fitted waist sits atop a figure-flaunting midi skirt with a sexy thigh-high side slit. Hidden side zipper/clasp.

Semiformal.name: Plaid Shirt With Black Dress Pants
Semiformal.description: A bit of formal and a bit of casual turns out into a plaid! Hone the latest plaid trend by incorporating it as a part of your semi-formal look.

Semiformal.name: Comfort Jacket
Semiformal.description: A versatile outer layer made with stretchy fabric for comfort. The lined sleeves make it easy to slip on and off.

Semiformal.name: Extra fine cotton Broadcloth long=sleeve shirt
Semiformal.description: Premium cotton shirt made from ultra-long cotton fibers. Stunning colors and an exquisite texture

Semiformal.name: Regular-fit shirt
Semiformal.description: In a cotton and linen weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Cotton and linen blends combine the softness of cotton with the sturdiness of linen, creating a beautiful, textured fabric that is breathable and drapes perfectly.

casual.name: Erina Mauve Multi Stripe Belted Midi Slip Dress
casual.description: This charming slip dress (composed of lightweight woven fabric) stuns with vertical stripes in shades of mauve pink, forest green, blush, chocolate brown, ash grey, and indigo blue.

casual.name: Repeat After Me Black Sleeveless Ruffled Bodysuit
casual.description: Lightweight stretch knit fabric composes of an elasticized, straight neckline and a sleeveless, fitted bodice supported by ruffled spaghetti straps.

casual.name: Verona Sage Green Drawstring Wide-Leg Jumpsuit
casual.description: Lightweight linen-blend fabric forms this versatile jumpsuit with a bib front and adjustable tank straps with brown marbled buttons.

casual.name: Kinship Black and White Striped Ribbed Bodysuit!
casual.description: Sleek ribbed knit is perfectly stretchy across short sleeves and a rounded neckline. Fitted bodice ends in thong bottoms with two snap closures.

casual.name: My Direction Red Smocked Puff Sleeve Bodysuit
casual.description: Lightweight knit fabric (with smocking throughout) shapes a scoop neckline framed by short puff sleeves with elastic at the hems.

casual.name: Luxe Cutie White Long Sleeve Collared Sweater
casual.description: Medium-gauge, sweater knit shapes this comfy sweater with a collared, V-neckline that carries into a relaxed, slightly-tapered bodice. Long, dolman-style sleeves with fitted cuffs complete the cute, casual look!

casual.name: Exotic Sol Tan and Terra Cotta Print Kimono
casual.description: Gauzy, lightweight viscose with an intricate tan print is easy to throw on after a swim. Wide sleeves and side slits.

casual.name: Bringing Sexy Back Emerald Green Backless Sweater Dress
casual.description: A rounded neckline and long sleeves bring all your favorite sweater elements to this dress, with a relaxed shape and deep V-back.

casual.name: Extra Fine Cotton Short-Sleeve Shirt
casual.description: Updated, roomy regular fit. Made with ultra-long cotton for an exquisite texture and color.

casual.name: Dry Stretch Easy Shorts (Leaf)(8")
casual.description: Made with twill for a perfectly casual style. Comfortable stretchy elastic waist

casual.name: Flannel Checked Long-Sleeve Shirt
casual.description: Flannel shirt with a solid yet airy feel. Brushed on both sides for extra warmth.

casual.name: Rugger Striped Short Sleeve Polo Shirt
casual.description: A comfortable 100% cotton polo shirt. Attractive design that respects tradition

casual.name: Chambray Work Long-Sleeve Shirt
casual.description: Chambray shirt with a work-style finish.Universal appeal.

casual.name: Regular Fit Fine=knit polo shirt
casual.description: Regular-fit polo shirt in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a collar, small V-shaped opening at the top and short sleeves. Fine ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

casual.name: Regular Fit T-shirt
casual.description: T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif on the front.

casual.name: Muscle Fit Polo shirt
casual.description: Polo shirt in a fine-knit modal and cotton blend with a ribbed collar, zip at the top and short raglan sleeves.

casual.name: Smocked cotton dress
casual.description: Knee-length dress in a cotton weave. Square neckline with frill trims and smocking at the top. Shoulder straps with a decorative bow and a gently flared skirt with a frill trim at the hem.

casual.name: Joggers
casual.description: Joggers in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems

casual.name: Leggings with brushed inside
casual.description: Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.

casual.name: Pocket-detail jersey top
casual.description: Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and open chest pocket.

casual.name: Leggings
casual.description: Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.

casual.name: Cargo Trousers
casual.description: Cargo trousers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and fake back pockets.

casual.name: joggers
casual.description: Joggers in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.

casual.name: Smocked cotton dress
casual.description: Shoulder straps with a decorative bow and a gently flared skirt with a frill trim at the hem.

SmartCasual.name: Miss Punctuality Black Lightweight Blazer
SmartCasual.description: creates a relaxed, breezy fit as it shapes this office-approved blazer with a collared neckline, skinny tuxedo-style lapels, and pointed hems.

SmartCasual.name: Miss Punctuality Black and White Floral Lightweight Blazert
SmartCasual.description: Artistic floral print, creates a relaxed, breezy fit as it shapes this office-approved blazer with a collared neckline, skinny tuxedo-style lapels, and pointed hems.

SmartCasual.name: Miss Punctuality Navy Blue Lightweight Blazert
SmartCasual.description: Sleek, lightweight woven fabric creates a relaxed, breezy fit as it shapes this office-approved blazer with a collared neckline, skinny tuxedo-style lapels, and pointed hems..

SmartCasual.name: Kinship Black and White Striped Ribbed BodysuSnow Day Sensation Black and White Plaid Peacoat
SmartCasual.description: Cozy long sleeves frame a notched collared neckline and a longline silhouette with a double button-front and diagonal welt pockets.

SmartCasual.name: Regular Fit Tailored lyocell trousers
SmartCasual.description: Covered elastication at the waist and a zip fly with a concealed button and hook-and-eye fastening. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and straight legs with creases.

SmartCasual.name: Relaxed Fit Unconstructed jacket
SmartCasual.description: Unconstructed jacket with notch lapels and a two-button fastening at the front. Relaxed fit with a chest pocket, patch front pockets, two inner pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs.

SmartCasual.name: Wool-blend coat
SmartCasual.description: Gauzy, lightweight viscose with an intricate tan print is easy to throw on after a swim. Wide sleeves and side slits.

SmartCasual.name: Essentials: The coat
SmartCasual.description: Coat in a felted wool blend with a refined twill texture, soft to the touch and super durable. Clean cut with a current, single-breasted silhouette, designed to fall just above the knee, and a regular fit for a relaxed feel.
